predicate.note: Frames file for 'fester' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to undergo decay, be in a condition of decline

example.name: intransitive
example.text: A story about how he mishandled the sale to his son of his stock in a media company controlled [*] by his political patron Percy Sutton [*T*-2] was allowed [*-3] to fester a full week before Mr. Dinkins faced the media .
example.arg: [*-3] -> A story about how he mishandled the sale to his son of his stock in a media company controlled [*] by his political patron Percy Sutton [*T*-2]
before Mr. Dinkins faced the media
